---
name: Feature request
about: Request a new feature or enhancement for the SCION endhost SDK
title: "feature-request: [short description]"
labels: "feature-request"
---

Please completely fill in the following template. If you are not sure about some
parts, please provide as much information as possible.

## Feature description

Provide a clear and concise description of the feature you'd like to see.

## Problem statement and use case

What problem does this feature solve? Is your feature request related to a specific pain point?
Describe your specific use case and how this feature would benefit your project.

## Proposed solution

Describe how you envision this feature working.

## Implementation considerations

Any specific technical considerations or constraints that should be taken into account? Here you can
also suggest a possible implementation approach.

## Alternative solutions

Have you considered any alternative solutions or workarounds?

## Additional context

Add any other context, screenshots, code examples, or references about the feature request here.
